lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Alan Walker/Anders Froen/Pablo Bowman/Nick Gale/Rick Boardman/Sarah Blanchard
[00:00.10] 作词 : Pablo Bowman/Daniel Boyle/Rick Boardman/Sarah Blanchard
[00:00.30]What's the trick? I wish I knew
[00:02.71]I'm so done with thinking through all the things I could've been
[00:07.63]And I know you wonder too
[00:09.96]All it takes is that one look you do and I run right back to you
[00:14.60]You crossed the line and it's time to say "F" you
[00:19.62]What's the point in saying that when you know how I'll react?
[00:24.35]You think you can just take it back, but shit just don't work like that
[00:29.48]You're the drug that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[00:34.41]Guess I'm stuck with you and that's that
[00:38.16]
[00:38.95]Cause when it all falls down, then whatever
[00:44.06]When it don't work out for the better
[00:49.00]If we just ain't right, and it's time to say goodbye
[00:53.92]When it all falls down, when it all falls down
[00:58.65]I'll be fine
[01:03.71]I'll be fine
[01:08.59]You're the drug that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[01:13.48]But I'll be fine
[01:14.72]
[01:18.42]Why we fight? I don't know
[01:21.17]We say what hurts the most
[01:23.26]Oh, I tried staying cold, but you take it personal
[01:28.27]All these firing shots and making ground
[01:30.94]It's way too hard to cope, but I still can't let you go
[01:36.72]
[01:37.68]Cause when it all falls down, then whatever
[01:42.88]When it don't work out for the better
[01:47.80]If we just ain't right, and it's time to say goodbye
[01:52.66]When it all falls down, when it all falls down
[01:57.50]I'll be fine
[02:02.51]I'll be fine
[02:07.36]You're the drug that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[02:12.12]But I'll be fine
[02:13.56]
[02:17.26]I'll be fine-ine-fine, fine-ine-ine
[02:22.16]I'll be fine-ine-fine, fine-ine-ine
[02:27.00]I'll be fine-ine-fine, fine-ine-ine
[02:31.81]I'll be fine-ine-fine, fine
[02:35.74]
[02:36.49]Cause when it all falls down, then whatever (Then whatever, babe)
[02:41.69]When it don't work out for the better (For the better)
[02:46.52]If we just ain't right, and it's time to say goodbye
[02:51.44]When it all falls down (When it all, when it all)
[02:53.84]When it all falls down (When it all falls down)
[02:56.28]I'll be fine (Fine, fine, fine)
[03:01.28]I'll be fine (I'll be fine)
[03:06.12]You're the drug that I'm addicted to and I want you so bad
[03:11.01]But I'll be fine (I'll be fine), and that's that
tlyric:
[by:咆哮的小清新___]
[00:00.30]爱的诀窍是什么 真希望我能懂
[00:02.71]我受够了总是去想我本能完成的所有
[00:07.63]我知道你也渴望着我
[00:09.96]我只需要望你一眼 就会愿意奔回你身边
[00:14.60]你越过了界 所以是时候对你说法克我拒绝
[00:19.62]当你知道我会是何反应 说那些又有何意义
[00:24.35]你以为你能收回一切 但偏偏老天就不开眼
[00:29.48]你是让我无比上瘾的药 我无比渴望着你
[00:34.41]我想我注定和你在一起 仅此而已
[00:38.95]当一切都陨落破碎 就怎样都好
[00:44.06]当事情并没有变得更好
[00:49.00]若一切就是怎么也不对 那就是时候止损告别
[00:53.92]当一切都陨落破碎 当一切都不再完美
[00:58.65]我也会很好
[01:03.71]我也无所谓
[01:08.59]你是让我无比上瘾的药 我无比想要你
[01:13.48]但没有也很好
[01:18.42]为何我们要争吵 我不知道
[01:21.17]我们总说着最伤人的话
[01:23.26]噢我试着保持冷静 你却保持针对
[01:28.27]所有的唇枪舌炮和所有的事有人为
[01:30.94]一切都太难应对 但我还是无法放弃你
[01:37.68]当一切都陨落破碎 就怎样都好
[01:42.88]当事情并没有变得更好
[01:47.80]若一切就是怎么也不对 那就是时候止损告别
[01:52.66]当一切都陨落破碎 当一切都不再完美
[01:57.50]我也会很好
[02:02.51]我也无所谓
[02:07.36]你是让我无比上瘾的药 我无比想要你
[02:12.12]但没有也很好
[02:17.26]我都会很好 我都无所谓
[02:22.16]我都能面对 我都无所谓
[02:27.00]我都会很好 我都无所谓
[02:31.81]无论怎样我都无所谓
[02:36.49]当一切都陨落破碎 就怎样都好
[02:41.69]当事情并没有变得更好
[02:46.52]若一切就是怎么也不对 那就是时候止损告别
[02:51.44]当一切都陨落破碎 当一切都不再完美
[02:53.84]当一切都陨落破碎
[02:56.28]我也会很好
[03:01.28]我也无所谓
[03:06.12]你是让我无比上瘾的药 我无比想要你
[03:11.01]但没有也无所谓 仅此而已
